scripts.deploy: npm run build && rsync -avz --exclude '.git' --exclude 'node_modules' -e 'ssh -i /Users/gooee/Desktop/AWS/awskey.pem' ./ ubuntu@3.14.252.54:/var/www/stl-soccer && ssh -i /Users/gooee/Desktop/AWS/awskey.pem ubuntu@3.14.252.54 'cd /var/www/stl-soccer && npm install && (pm2 restart stl-soccer || pm2 start npm --name stl-soccer -- start)'
